Class com.Verisign.payment.PFProAPI

public class PFProAPI
extends Object
PFProAPI - Verisign Payflow Pro API class

PFProAPI()

CreateContext(String, int, int, String, int, String, String)
CreateContext() - This function creates a context which is used to communicate with the Verisign Payment Server.
DestroyContext()
DestroyContext() - Destroys the context created by CreateContext().
SubmitTransaction(String)
SubmitTransaction() - Submits a transaction to the Verisign Payment Server.
Version()
PNVersion() - Returns the Payflow Pro Client Version string.

PFProAPI 
 public PFProAPI()

Version 
 public native String Version()
PNVersion() - Returns the Payflow Pro Client Version string.

CreateContext 
 public native int CreateContext(String HostAddress,
                                 int HostPort,
                                 int Timeout,
                                 String ProxyAddress,
                                 int ProxyPort,
                                 String ProxyLogon,
                                 String ProxyPassword)
CreateContext() - This function creates a context which is used to communicate with the Verisign Payment Server.

Parameters:
HostAddress - Connect to address (Example: test.signio.com)
HostPort - Port to connect to (Example: 443)
Timeout - Seconds in before transaction fails due to timeout
ProxyAddress - The address of your proxy server if you have one, "" otherwise
ProxyPort - The port of your proxy server if you have one, 0 otherwise
ProxyLogon - Your logon name on your proxy server if you have one, "" otherwise
ProxyPassword - Your password on your proxy server if you have one, "" otherwise
DestroyContext 
 public native int DestroyContext()
DestroyContext() - Destroys the context created by CreateContext().

SubmitTransaction 
 public native String SubmitTransaction(String ParmList)
SubmitTransaction() - Submits a transaction to the Verisign Payment Server.

Parameters:
ParmList - Variables passed to Verisign. See Verisign Integration Documentation.
